Title: Profile Modal - Buy Credits Button
Description: Verify Buy Credits button navigates to pricing page

Title: Profile Modal - Buy Credits Button
Steps: Locate 'Buy Credits' button next to Remaining credits field.
Expected Result: Button is visible with shopping cart icon.

Title: Profile Modal - Buy Credits Button
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. User is redirected to /pricing page.

Title: Profile Modal - Current Plan Display
Description: Verify Current Plan field shows Starter Plan

Title: Profile Modal - Current Plan Display
Expected Result: Field is visible and displays 'Starter Plan' value.

Title: Profile Modal - Current Plan Display
Steps: Try to edit Current Plan field.
Expected Result: Field is disabled/read-only and cannot be edited.

Title: Profile Modal - Upgrade Plan Button
Description: Verify Upgrade Plan button navigates to pricing

Title: Profile Modal - Upgrade Plan Button
Steps: Locate 'Upgrade Plan' button next to Current Plan field.
Expected Result: Button is visible with sparkles icon and amber color.

Title: Profile Modal - Upgrade Plan Button
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. User is redirected to /pricing page.

Title: Account Menu - Upgrade Plan Removed
Description: Verify Upgrade Plan is no longer in account menu
Expected Result: Menu opens showing My Profile, Export Tasks, Import Tasks, Sign Out.

Title: Account Menu - Upgrade Plan Removed
Expected Result: 'Upgrade Plan' menu item is NOT present in dropdown.

Title: Profile Modal - Credits and Plan Layout
Description: Verify layout of credits and plan section

Title: Profile Modal - Credits and Plan Layout
Expected Result: Field shows credit balance with credit card icon and 'Buy Credits' button on the right.

Title: Profile Modal - Credits and Plan Layout
Expected Result: Field shows 'Starter Plan' with 'Upgrade Plan' button on the right.

Title: Profile Modal - Buttons Styling
Preconditions: User Logged In on Light Theme
Expected Result: Buttons have proper light theme styling.

Title: Profile Modal - Buttons Styling
Expected Result: Buttons have proper dark theme styling with appropriate borders and hover states.

Title: Profile Modal - i18n Spanish
Description: Verify Spanish translations for new features
Preconditions: User Logged In, Language set to Spanish
